# @xania/view

Xania is th√© **fastest** JavaScript view library for building user interfaces.
Main goal of xania is to provide a highly performant components that can interop seemlessly with React.

![build](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@xania/view?style=for-the-badge) ![size](https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/minzip/@xania/view?style=for-the-badge)

[![js framework benchamark](./assets/js-framework-benchmark.svg)](https://krausest.github.io/js-framework-benchmark/current.html#)

#### Key Features

- üöÄ Blazingly fast: The fastest implementation in the JavaScript framework benchmark.
- üî• React interop: Xania components integrates seemlessly in a react application.
- üòé Fine-grained reactivity: No vdom / rerender of the components. Supports observables (e.g. rxjs ) as input from outside world to listen to changes and pinpoint the DOM that needs to update without recreating the DOM.
- ‚è∞ Async everywhere: First class support for async components or any part of it, async update commands, async derived state, async everything, etc‚Ä¶
